rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with a traditional Kerala-style archway and stone accents.

rooms.name: Living Area
rooms.description: Open-plan living space integrated with the kitchen area. Features wide windows for ample natural light, adhering to Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern open-kitchen designed in a traditional Kerala style with granite countertops and wooden shelves. Located adjacent to the living area for easy access.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A modest guest bedroom featuring a window facing east to ensure morning light.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Larger master bedroom oriented towards the north-east for positive energy as per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Bathroom ( ensuite )
rooms.description: Attached bathroom with water-saving fixtures and traditional Kerala-style tiles.
